question_sentence: Hungary’s parliament just passed a constitutional amendment that bans which of the following?
evidence: The amendment allows the government to ban all LGBTQ+ events and codifies a law that lets authorities to use facial recognition tools to identify people who attend such events.

question_sentence: Puerto Rico struggled to deal with which major issue this week?
evidence: An island-wide blackout hit Puerto Rico on Wednesday as the largely Catholic residents of the US territory prepared to celebrate Easter weekend.

question_sentence: Which of these women did not fly on Blue Origin’s suborbital space tourism mission this week?
evidence: Oprah did not fly to the edge of space, but her best friend, “CBS Mornings” co-host Gayle King did.

question_sentence: According to a new study, the shingles vaccine may do more than just help protect people from the painful disease. What is this added benefit?
evidence: Although the two-dose shingles vaccine may force you to lay low for a day or two after getting the shot, it may also reduce the risk of dementia.

question_sentence: Why did the cast of the 1980s coming-of-age movie “The Breakfast Club” recently reunite?
choices: One of them just got married
Unveil a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame
evidence: The stars took to the stage at the Chicago Comic and Entertainment Expo for the film’s 40th anniversary.

question_sentence: Which US senator made a surprise visit to the Coachella music festival last weekend?
evidence: Sen. Bernie Sanders took a moment to urge the crowd to fight for justice — and introduced indie-pop singer Clairo.

question_sentence: Which comedian has been tapped to host the 2025 Emmy Awards in September?
evidence: Nate Bargatze, who has made a name for himself with a particular brand of family-friendly comedy, will host the event.

question_sentence: Which professional golfer completed the career grand slam last weekend?
evidence: Rory McIlroy won the 2025 Master’s tournament and joined one of golf’s most exclusive fraternities. He is just the sixth player to win each of golf’s four majors.

question_sentence: What's the name of the new trend that has people testing the limits of how late they can arrive at the airport to catch a flight?
evidence: Airport theory is a TikTok trend that invites people to arrive at the airport as little as 15 minutes before their flight boards.

question_sentence: Why are national parks bracing for “a hold-your-breath year” as the tourist season heats up?
choices: More people taking selfies with bison
evidence: The Trump administration ordered a hiring freeze in January, fired over 1,000 national park personnel in February and is currently offering buyouts and early retirement packages.
